JayChung


PUBLICATIONS  CV  PORTFOLIO 


Hi! It's Gisu Chung.
I received a master's degree in the department of Electrical & Electronic Engineering from Dongguk University, in 2021.
During the master's degree, I researched efficient network compression methods for utilizing CNN in real-time inference.
Also, I studied video data augmentation strategy for 3D CNN-based approach such as video action recognition task.
Recently, I've worked as a Machine Learning Engineer Intern at On-device & AI moderation squad in Hyperconnect ML Team.
For more, check out my CV and contact me by email.


 - Research Interests -

Model Compression

3D CNN based Video Recognition

Generative Adversarial Network

Network pruning as an Neural Architecture Search

Data-centric view of training strategy

 - Education -

M.S.Engineering : DGU DIPL(Digital Image Processing Lab), Mar.2019 - Feb.2021


B.S.Engineering : DGU Electrical & Electronic Engineering, Mar.2013 - Feb.2019
